instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-00923: What is 820-00923? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A ( MBP 13 touchbar) only charging one side usb c.
threads.message:
Hi,

Got this MBP 13 touchbar with water damage. Cleaned, repaired all short and components were damaged and now 3 of 4 usb ports are working fine. But 1 of USB-C only turn on and charge when plug one side. When up side down the connecter it's not detected. Already checked all componentes arroung fpc and nothing seems to be bad. 

Any idea?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A ( MBP 13 touchbar) only charging one side usb c.
threads.message:
Do you get 20V on that USB-C in reverse position?
Which is that port in schematic?

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A ( MBP 13 touchbar) only charging one side usb c.
threads.message:
Yeah, i get 20V and macbook boots. 

[URL]http://g-search3.alicdn.com/img/bao/uploaded/i4/i1/692665432/TB2k6iBe9CWBuNjy0FhXXb6EVXa_!!692665432.jpg[/URL]

on this image it is left, down usb-c port that fail

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A ( MBP 13 touchbar) only charging one side usb c.
threads.message:
Check continuity on board traces and give as a name in schematic.
So machine works in that position, but no external USB device recognized when connected in that way?
In such case, check CC1/2 lines for that port.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00923</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A ( MBP 13 touchbar) only charging one side usb c.
threads.message: Finally customer take it away with that fail. Will bring it back next month. Thanks
